TopicTitle: 9pm tonight-Live stream of my review of KSP with the new Steam Controller.

Articles.Content:
Please join me tonight as I will be doing a Live stream tonight at 9pm Est reviewing the new Steam Controller with KSP!!


~[SIZE=2]http://www.twitch.tv/chaotic_daemon[/SIZE]
This sort of thing belongs in our "Live from Mission Control" section, moved over for you. :)
My apologies. Thank you very much.
